Package com.yantra.ydm.japi.ue

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    YDMBeforeAddContainerToManifestUE  
    YDMBeforeAddToContainerUE
    add defaults for container creation operation.
    YDMBeforeChangeShipment
    add defaults for shipment creation operation.
    YDMBeforeChangeShipmentContainerUE
    add defaults for shipment container creation operation.
    YDMBeforeConsolidateToShipment
    specify consolidation preference.
    YDMBeforeCreateLoad
    add defaults for load creation operation.
    YDMBeforeCreateShipment
    add defaults for shipment creation operation.
    YDMBeforeDetermineRoutingUE
    Override any input criteria before the actual SCAC determination process.
    YDMBeforeManageRoutingGuideUE
    Override any input criteria before the actual SCAC determination process.
    YDMBeforePackShipment
    add defaults for pack shipment operation.
    YDMCanAddToContainerUE
    specify whether to allow addition of Container to another Container.
    YDMCanShipmentBeProcessedUE
    indicates whether a shipment can be processed
    YDMComputeCheckDigitUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism to override the check digit computation logic and generate your own check digit for the given Pro Number.
    YDMDetermineRoutingExternallyUE
    User exit to externally determine the SCAC
    YDMDetermineShipmentToConsolidateWith
    determine shipment to consolidate with.
    YDMGetMonitoringCalendarForShipmentUE  
    YDMGetNextContainerSCMUE
    gets the next SCM.
    YDMGetNextProNoUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for PRO number Generation whenever a PRO Number generation is required for a Load and the PRO Number Generation Scheme is 'Externally Generated'.
    YDMGetNextSCMUE
    gets the next SCM.
    YDMGetOverridenAttributesForShipmentLineItemUE
    User exit to retrieve item overrides for a shipment line
    YDMGetShipmentInstructionsUE  
    YDMGetTransportationCostUE
    User exit that provides transportation cost for shipment.
    YDMOverrideDetermineRoutingUE
    Override the outputs of the determineRouting API.
    YDMShouldShipmentMonitorAlertBeRaisedUE
